verses.verse: Then came near <WH5066> the heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' houses of the Levites <WH3881> unto Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and unto Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and unto the heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' houses of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>;

and they spake <WH1696> unto them at Shiloh <WH7887> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, saying <WH559>, Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> to <WH3027> give <WH5414> us cities <WH5892> to dwell in <WH3427>, with the suburbs <WH4054> thereof for our cattle <WH929>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> unto the Levites <WH3881> out of their inheritance <WH5159>, according to the commandment <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068>, these cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>.

And the lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956>: and the children <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>, who were of the Levites <WH3881>, had by lot <WH1486> out of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah <WH3063>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of the Simeonites <WH8099>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Benjamin <WH1144>, thirteen <WH7969> cities <WH5892>.

And the rest <WH3498> of the children <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> had by lot <WH1486> out of the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of Ephraim <WH669>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>, and out of the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519>, ten <WH6235> cities <WH5892>.

And the children <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> had by lot <WH1486> out of the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar <WH3485>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Asher <WH836>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Naphtali <WH5321>, and out of the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519> in Bashan <WH1316>, thirteen <WH7969> cities <WH5892>.

The children <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> according to their families <WH4940> had out of the tribe <WH4294> of Reuben <WH7205>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Gad <WH1410>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun <WH2074>, twelve <WH8147> cities <WH5892>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> by lot <WH1486> unto the Levites <WH3881> these cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>, as Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872>.

And they gave <WH5414> out of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095>, these cities <WH5892> which are here mentioned <WH7121> by name <WH8034>:

and they were for the children <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175>, of the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956>, who were of the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>; for theirs was the first <WH7223> lot <WH1486>.

And they gave <WH5414> them Kiriath-arba <WH7151>, which Arba <WH704> was the father <WH1> of Anak <WH6061> (the same is Hebron <WH2275>), in the hill-country <WH2022> of Judah <WH3063>, with the suburbs <WH4054> thereof round about it <WH5439>.
But the fields <WH7704> of the city <WH5892>, and the villages <WH2691> thereof <WH5414>, gave they to Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> for his possession <WH272>.

And unto the children <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> they gave <WH5414> Hebron <WH2275> with its suburbs <WH4054>, the city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the manslayer <WH7523>, and Libnah <WH3841> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
and Jattir <WH3492> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Eshtemoa <WH851> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
and Holon <WH2473> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Debir <WH1688> with its suburbs <WH4054>,

and Ain <WH5871> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Juttah <WH3194> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Beth-shemesh <WH1053> with its suburbs <WH4054>; nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> out of those two <WH8147> tribes <WH7626>.
And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Benjamin <WH1144>, Gibeon <WH1391> with its suburbs <WH4054>, Geba <WH1387> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
Anathoth <WH6068> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Almon <WH5960> with its suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
All the cities <WH5892> of the children <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175>, the priests <WH3548>, were thirteen <WH7969> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>.

And the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955>, the Levites <WH3881>, even the rest <WH3498> of the children <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955>, they had the cities <WH5892> of their lot <WH1486> out of the tribe <WH4294> of Ephraim <WH669>.

And they gave <WH5414> them Shechem <WH7927> with its suburbs <WH4054> in the hill-country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669>, the city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the manslayer <WH7523>, and Gezer <WH1507> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
and Kibzaim <WH6911> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Beth-horon <WH1032> with its suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>, Elteke <WH514> with its suburbs <WH4054>, Gibbethon <WH1405> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
Aijalon <WH357> with its suburbs <WH4054>, Gath-rimmon <WH1667> with its suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the <WH4276> half-tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519>, Taanach <WH8590> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Gath-rimmon <WH1667> with its suburbs <WH4054>; two <WH8147> cities <WH5892>.
All the cities <WH5892> of the families <WH4940> of the rest <WH3498> of the children <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> were ten <WH6235> with their suburbs <WH4054>.

And unto the children <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648>, of the families <WH4940> of the Levites <WH3881>, out of the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519> they gave Golan <WH1474> in Bashan <WH1316> with its suburbs <WH4054>, the city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the manslayer <WH7523>, and Be-eshterah <WH1203> with its suburbs <WH4054>; two <WH8147> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar <WH3485>, Kishion <WH7191> with its suburbs <WH4054>, Daberath <WH1705> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
Jarmuth <WH3412> with its suburbs <WH4054>, En-gannim <WH5873> with its suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Asher <WH836>, Mishal <WH4861> with its suburbs <WH4054>, Abdon <WH5658> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
Helkath <WH2520> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Rehob <WH7340> with its suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.

And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Naphtali <WH5321>, Kedesh <WH6943> in Galilee <WH1551> with its suburbs <WH4054>, the city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the manslayer <WH7523>, and Hammoth-dor <WH2576> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Kartan <WH7178> with its suburbs <WH4054>; three <WH7969> cities <WH5892>.
All the cities <WH5892> of the Gershonites <WH1649> according to their families <WH4940> were thirteen <WH7969> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>.

And unto the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>, the rest <WH3498> of the Levites <WH3881>, out of the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun <WH2074>, Jokneam <WH3362> with its suburbs <WH4054>, and Kartah <WH7177> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
Dimnah <WH1829> with its suburbs <WH4054>, Nahalal <WH5096> with its suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the tribe of Reuben <WH7205>, Bezer <WH1221> with its suburbs <WH3096>, and Jahaz with its suburbs,
Kedemoth <WH6932> with its suburbs <WH4158>, and Mephaath with its suburbs <WH702>; four cities <WH5892>.

And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Gad <WH1410>, Ramoth <WH7433> in Gilead <WH1568> with its suburbs <WH4054>, the city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the manslayer <WH7523>, and Mahanaim <WH4266> with its suburbs <WH4054>,
Heshbon <WH2809> with its suburbs <WH4054>, Jazer <WH3270> with its suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities in all <WH5892>.

All these were the cities <WH5892> of the children <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> according to their families <WH4940>, even the rest <WH3498> of the families <WH4940> of the Levites <WH3881>; and their lot <WH1486> was twelve <WH8147> cities <WH5892>.

All the cities <WH5892> of the Levites <WH3881> in the midst <WH272> of the possession <WH272> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were forty <WH705> and eight <WH8083> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>.
These cities <WH5892> were every one <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054> round about <WH5439> them <WH5892>: thus it was with all these cities.

So Jehovah <WH3068> gave <WH5414> unto Israel <WH3478> all the land <WH776> which he sware <WH7650> to give <WH5414> unto their fathers <WH1>; and they possessed <WH3423> it <WH3427>, and dwelt therein.

And Jehovah <WH3068> gave them rest <WH5117> round about <WH5439>, according to all that he sware <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1>: and there stood <WH5975> not a man <WH376> of all their enemies <WH341> before <WH6440> them <WH3068>; Jehovah delivered <WH5414> all their enemies <WH341> into their hand <WH3027>.
There failed <WH5307> not aught <WH1697> of any good <WH2896> thing <WH1697> which Jehovah <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>; all came to pass <WH935>.
